00018 //---------------------------------------------------------
00019 //   BeamSegment
00020 //---------------------------------------------------------
00021 
00022 struct BeamSegment {
00023       QPointF p1, p2;
00024 
00025       BeamSegment() {}
00026       BeamSegment(const QPointF& a, const QPointF& b) : p1(a), p2(b) {}
00027       void move(double x, double y) {
00028             QPointF m(x, y);
00029             p1 += m;
00030             p2 += m;
00031             }
00032       };
00033 
00034 typedef pstl::plist<BeamSegment*> BeamSegmentList;
00035 typedef BeamSegmentList::iterator iBeamSegment;
00036 typedef BeamSegmentList::const_iterator ciBeamSegment;
00037 
00038 //---------------------------------------------------------
00039 //   Beam
00040 //    Balken
00041 //---------------------------------------------------------
00042 
00043 class Beam : public Element {
00044       ChordRestList elements;
00045       BeamSegmentList beamSegments;
00046 
00047    public:
00048       Beam(Score* s) : Element(s, BEAM) {}
00049       ~Beam();
00050       Beam(const Beam& m) : Element(m) {}
00051       virtual Beam* clone() const { return new Beam(*this); }
00052       void layout();
00053       void add(ChordRest* a) { elements.add(a); }
00054       void remove(ChordRest* a);
00055       QString xmlType(ChordRest*) const;
00056       virtual void move(double, double);
00057 
00058       virtual void draw1(Painter&) const;
00059       };
